GUI
Class TransparentBackground

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              GUI.TransparentBackground
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ComponentListener, java.awt.event.WindowFocusListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener
public class TransparentBackground
extends javax.swing.JComponent
implements java.awt.event.ComponentListener, java.awt.event.WindowFocusListener, java.lang.Runnable

The class is used to make a transparent components.
